import React from "react" import { Table, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardTitle, TabContent, TabPane, Nav, NavItem, NavLink } from "reactstrap" import classnames from "classnames" import { Eye, Code } from "react-feather" import { tableHeadOption } from "./TableSourceCode" class TableHeadOption extends React.Component { state = { activeTab: "1" } toggleTab = tab => { if (this.state.activeTab !== tab) { this.setState({ activeTab: tab }) } } render() { return ( Table head option
{ this.toggleTab("1") }} > { this.toggleTab("2") }} >

Use class .thead-dark with thead tag for dark head.
